tab.creator: Shipwright
bot.new-replay.msg: What be the name of this fine tale?
bot.overwrite-current: This tale be lost forever. Be ye certain?
bot.confirm-delete: Ye sure ye want to cast {} to the depths?
bypass.allowlowvolume.desc: Lets ye hush the sounds below 3%.
bypass.levelkick.desc: No storm nor sea monster shall toss ye out o' yer voyage.
bypass.charlimit.desc: No limit to how long ye ramble.
bypass.checkpointlimit.desc: Place more than 50 markers in yer practice runs.
bypass.commenthistory.desc: Spy on any scallywags' comment history. (Crafted by Uproxide)
bypass.practicemusic.desc: Sing the same tune in practice as ye do in battle.
bypass.musiccustomizer.desc: Lets ye pick custom menu and practice tunes.
bypass.pausebuffering.desc: Stops the game from catchin' ye cheatin' with pauses.
bypass.unlockicons.desc: No need to work for treasure, have all the shiny baubles ye want!
bypass.unlockpaths.desc: All secret paths be open to ye!
bypass.unlockmainlevels.desc: No locks on any main voyage.
bypass.unlockshops.desc: Enter any shop without tradin' doubloons.
bypass.copybypass.desc: Lets ye copy any level, no questions asked.
creator.defaultsongbypass.desc: Sing songs that be locked away from most landlubbers.
creator.editorwave.desc: Watch the waves in the editor, aye!
creator.leveledit.desc: Opens the level editor in any part o' the sea.
creator.nocopymark.desc: Removes the pesky copy mark from yer maps.
creator.sliderlimit.desc: Move the sliders as far as ye wish!
creator.smoothtrail.desc: Make the trail in editor playback smooth as the sea at dawn.
bypass.verifyhack.desc: No need to prove yerself, just call it done!
interface.blur-speed: How Fast the Fog Rolls In
bot.delete-invalid.msg: Pick a tale ye wish to send to Davy Jones!
bot.overwrite: Ye sure ye want to scuttle {}?
bypass.unlockvaults.desc: Break ito all secret holds and vaults.
creator.customobjectbypass.desc: Stack up more objects than any pirate should be allowed!
bypass.charfilter.desc: Gives ye free rein to squawk what ye please.
bypass.instantcomplete.desc: Finishes the level quicker than a cannonball!
creator.resetpercentonsave.desc: Erase the voyage progress when ye save. (Crafted by TechStudent10)
bypass.menugameplay.desc: Control yer scallywag on the main deck.
global.audiospeed.desc: Speed up or slow down the tunes of the sea.
creator.hidetriggers.desc: Hides triggers while testin' the waters.
creator.hideui.desc: Toss the UI overboard, leave only the adventure!
